skins.shipDescription: J-class destroyer ` Javelin, Hull Number F61!
skins.selfIntroduction: Good day, Commander! I'm the J class destroyer Javelin! My sisters and I were part of the Narvik battle and the evacuation of Dunkirk! I had a little trouble along the way, but I fought until the very end!
skins.acquisition: I'm Javelin, Commander. Nice to meet you. Oh ho? You look like you have no idea what to do with a girl of your type being assigned to you!
skins.details: Commander, you care so much about me... I'm so very happy!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Let's work hard for the whole day!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Fwa... I don't like to feel nonexistent. I'm gonna strike back~
skins.secretaryIdle4: Commander, Commander, let's play with me~!
skins.secretaryIdle5: Commander... it feels safe by your side~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Kyaa~! Commander, perverted behaviour is bad!

skins.shipDescription: Heavy attack mode prepared, ready to use ultimate firepower! Check out the incredible glow on this new gun!
skins.acquisition: Heavy attack mode prepared, ready to use ultimate firepower! Check out the incredible glow on this new gun!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Good~ I'll be able to help out with your hard training schedule today! Oh? We can't fire our guns inside? I forgot...
skins.secretaryIdle2: "The wind caresses the sea, starlight rises o'er the horizon. May courage fill my heart. Transform!" What do you think about my new incantation?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm going to get stronger and cuter! Just you wait!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: That's not going to work, even though you're the Commander!

skins.JPClientName: 幸せのジュ`ンブライド
skins.shipDescription: Today, I must be the happiest girl in the world! Hehe~
skins.acquisition: Today, I must be the happiest girl in the world! Hehe~
skins.details: By the way, Commander, I just remembered how I was making a goofy grin the whole time at our ceremony... Sorry, but I just couldn't help it! At that time, I just felt way too happy!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, even though I already know that you're always looking after me, I'll still get upset if you don't pay attention to me!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, is there anything you'd like Javelin to do? Really? Nothing at all~?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, it's all your fault! I walked into this wall because I couldn't stop daydreaming about you!
skins.secretaryTouch: Hup! ... Hehe, being in Commander's arms is the most comfortable of all~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ahhhn~! Ah, Commander... did I make a really "adult" sound just now?!

skins.shipDescription: Everyone, hurry up! We rarely get to go out to play, so let's make every minute count! Javelin packed plenty of lunches, so let's have a picnic by the beach!
skins.acquisition: Everyone, hurry up! We rarely get to go out to play, so let's make every minute count! Javelin packed plenty of lunches, so let's have a picnic by the beach!
skins.details: Don't worry, guys~! I've already packed all your favorite foods!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, the others are rushing us. Let's finish strong, so we can join them on the beach!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Look at all our friends out there! Commander, if you don't mind, I'll go prepare some extra lunches!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, let's make a bunch of unforgettable memories on the beach this year as well!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, your hands are freezing cold! Jeez, it's payback time! Take this! And this!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, if you want to be more popular, you'll have to treat your girls better~

skins.shipDescription: Tada! We’re all wearing the same uniform! It’s super cute, isn’t it? Heehee, I’ll be wearing it the entire time I’m on duty, so make sure to visit!
skins.acquisition: Tada! We’re all wearing the same uniform! It’s super cute, isn’t it? Heehee, I’ll be wearing it the entire time I’m on duty, so make sure to visit!
skins.login: Ah! Commander! Thanks for coming~ I'm Javelin, I'll be your server today~
skins.details: Commander! Don't you think we all look super cute in these uniforms?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Don't hesitate to call me if you need anything~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Z23, remember to smile~ Ayanami, please don't give that death glare to our customers. Laffey, wake up! ....Right then, what can I get for you, sir?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Feel free to drop in any time you need a rest, Commander~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, shhh, don't let them hear. I actually learned a lot of new kitchen tricks working here. How about we go back to your place and I give you a taste~?

skins.login: Welcome back, Commander! Don't I look super cool today? Ehehe~?
skins.details: ?~What kind of lunch should I pack today~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Little Bel and Belfast somehow feel like... mother and child?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Which club should I join...? Cooking club? Knitting club? Nnnh... I just can't decide!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Juneau, are you going shopping with the others later? Aww, let me come too!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Jeez, no lewding! How many times do I have to repeat myself?

skins.JPClientName: ジャベリン?枕投げ大椋
skins.shipDescription: Laffey, Z23, Ayanami, and Unicorn - are you girls ready? Ehehe~ I'm not planning to lose to any of you today~!
skins.acquisition: Laffey, Z23, Ayanami, and Unicorn - are you girls ready? Ehehe~ I'm not planning to lose to any of you today~!
skins.details: My usual bear pyjamas are super cute and all, but it's always nice to change into something different! Ehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Unicorn, your drawings are really good! Ehhhh... you even know how to sculpt?!
skins.secretaryIdle2: This cake is so delicious~ Woah... self control, self control!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Enterprise, did you like the lunch that I made for you? Ehh? You also made your own?! Well then, can I try some of yours?
skins.secretaryTouch: All righty, I'm ready to deliver a pillow smackdown!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Woah! Commander, how many times have I told you, no lewding!

skins.shipDescription: "Hello, everyone~! I'm Javelin, the new idol who arrived from the Royal Navy! I hope that my songs will be able to bring a smile to everyone's faces, so please take good care of me!" Hehe, how was that for an introduction, Commander?
skins.acquisition: "Hello, everyone~! I'm Javelin, the new idol who arrived from the Royal Navy! I hope that my songs will be able to bring a smile to everyone's faces, so please take good care of me!" Hehe, how was that for an introduction, Commander?
skins.login: Hehe, let's turn those frowns upside down and have a great day!
skins.details: Hehe~ Next time, I want all four of us to get on stage and perform together!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, how did I look on stage? Ehehe, I'll work even harder for next time!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I learned some new dance moves today! Wanna see?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Right now, I can say with confidence that I want to bring a smile to everyone's face. Not just the people around me, but to everyone in the whole wide world! Ehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle4: Commander!! Hurry, look, I landed another audition! I'm so happy!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ehehe, since you're so into this, I'll sing another song for you~
